testcase.classname: Telehealth Filter Result Validation based on Telehealth Provider Name Search
testcase.name: Verify Telehealth Provider Name Search
testcase.system-out: Given I am in the "Regence" brand login page of "authenticated" user experience in "QA1" environment.passed When I login with valid username as "TESTBLUWANWFFT" and valid Password as "password$1".passed And I click on Find a Doctor link and select "medicalProvider" Icon.........passed Then I should be landed on the HSQ Home page................................passed And verify the title of the HSQ Home page as "Search homepage"..............passed Then I Verify the location is defaulted to "1 TEST DEMO ST, SEATTL..."......passed And I Update the address in choose your search location as "Salt Lake City, UT" if it is found as invalid.passed And I click on "search_All" option..........................................passed And I enter the Telehealth provider name as "Scott, David W, LMFT"..........passed And I select the Telehealth filter..........................................passed Then the searched provider should be displayed with the Telehealth text "Telehealth".passed And I close the HSQ tab.....................................................passed And I Navigate back to Regence Member Dashboard Page........................passed And I Click on SignOut hyperlink............................................passed And I Closed the browser window.............................................passed

testcase.classname: Telehealth Filter Result Validation based on Telehealth Provider Name Search
testcase.name: Verify Telehealth Provider Name Search 2
testcase.system-out: Given I am in the "Asuris" brand login page of "authenticated" user experience in "QA1" environment.passed When I login with valid username as "TestASURASTest3" and valid Password as "password$1".passed And I click on Find a Doctor link and select "medicalProvider" Icon.........passed Then I should be landed on the HSQ Home page................................passed And verify the title of the HSQ Home page as "Search homepage"..............passed Then I Verify the location is defaulted to "10 BROWN ST, SPOKANE, ..."......passed And I Update the address in choose your search location as "SPOKANE, WA 99201" if it is found as invalid.passed And I click on "search_All" option..........................................passed And I enter the Telehealth provider name as "Fury, Beth A, LMHC"............passed And I select the Telehealth filter..........................................passed Then the searched provider should be displayed with the Telehealth text "Telehealth".passed And I close the HSQ tab.....................................................passed And I Navigate back to Regence Member Dashboard Page........................passed And I Click on SignOut hyperlink............................................passed And I Closed the browser window.............................................passed
